creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Rug, Ferraghan, the field is caovered with a Herati pattern on a blue ground. Five borders; the main one, very wide, carries a shield design with star shape in center connected by angular vines with latch hooks at the turn. This is flanked by narrow borders with the pear design. The outer border has flower and knap on a yellow, beige ground. Sides overcast with dark wool. One end has a narrow web turned back, the other a fringe of short warp threads. Senna Knot. Cotton warp and woof.
title: Rug
